content.text: [10:03] Big question: Why hire from India?
[10:22] Because India still has an edge across finance, marketing, and tech.
[10:37] Cost advantage, yes—but more importantly, adaptability and work ethic.
[10:57] Indian professionals thrive on global projects with a hunger to learn.
[11:27] And with AI rising, the key is using it to amplify—not replace—their skills.
[12:17] That’s how India stays relevant on the global stage.

content.text: , a very sudden transition is happening in the reel from problem to solution.
Reel flow needs to be improved.
Here is the suggested flow of the reel.
"So I have a client who's from UK and he's basically an online coach. So he was using AI for managing his emails and for scheduling purposes."
"You know these people like they are quite busy… they are time pressed… they don’t get time to do their things by their own."
"So everything was going pretty well initially and with the time the things started going South."
"They were important leads which were missed because there was no manual follow up. There were times where they were double bookings because the platforms were not synced."
"Most importantly, the responses to the emails were very transactional."
"So I had a conversation with him and I got to know the pain points, like what actually is troubling him."
"And we got him a VA. The person who understands his business, who understands his client’s needs and his own working style."
"She started writing the emails in a tone which actually sounds like him. She started manually following up with the leads."
"And not only this, like she started syncing all the platforms… and then started doing the scheduling and everything."

content.text: We promoted the “Go Live” reel on Instagram to highlight our instant execution model and positioning shift from traditional hiring to
The reel message focused on eliminating delays, discovery calls, and fluff — showcasing how
Today, we re-optimized and launched the
campaign to promote our instant execution model.
speed, no delays, and action-first hiring
Before running, we optimized targeting, creatives, and budget based on past performance for better reach and engagement.
“The best content doesn’t always win. The most felt content does.”
Drive higher engagement (views, likes, shares, and saves) through emotionally resonant content targeting brand marketers, founders, and content creators.
Interests: Branding, Content Strategy, Copywriting, Digital Marketing, Social Media Growth
Startup Founders, Marketing Heads, Agency Owners, Social Media Managers, Personal Brand Creators
Rationale: High density of digital-first creators and marketing teams
"AI isn’t buying your pitch. It’s measuring your proof."
– Focused on showing that AI values results over hype, targeting audiences interested in hiring, performance, and data-driven execution.
– Highlighted our instant execution model, eliminating delays and sales fluff, aimed at decision-makers who value speed and action.
based on demographics, interests, and behaviors.
across Instagram Feed, Stories, and Explore.

issuetype.name: Task

content.text: Workforce ROI > Headcount: The New Metric Every CXO Should Track
Headcount doesn’t equal value. Skill-velocity and adaptability do.
CFOs are questioning team costs across functions.
VE’s team structures deliver skill density, not bloated payrolls.

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

content.text: Why India is Quietly Becoming the World’s Operating System
India isn’t a talent pool. It’s infrastructure. And it’s everywhere.
Global companies are relying on India across delivery, support, dev, CX, and more.
Position VE as a trusted interface into India’s rising influence.

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

content.text: Talent Arbitrage is Dead. Talent Intelligence is the New Game.
Move the conversation from cost-saving to strategic advantage through data + skill mapping.
Leadership needs deeper control over capabilities, not just headcount.
Highlight VE’s focus on matching domain-specific skills + continuous learning.

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

content.text: Why Remote Staffing is the Most Underrated AI Strategy in 2025
Combine the AI wave with global staffing strategies for smart business growth.
Everyone’s discussing AI but not how to operationalize it.
Show VE as a plug-and-play AI workforce enabler, not just a staffing provider.

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

content.text: The Cost of One Bad Hire in the West vs. One Free Trial with VE
Tangible cost-benefit comparison that leads into VE’s free trial offering.
Hiring mistakes in recession-era budgets are unaffordable.
Make VE’s model look smarter, safer, and more accountable.

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

content.text: From Vendor to Partner: How Remote Teams Became the Backbone of Global Ops
Insightful piece showing the evolution of outsourcing from back-office to core ops.
Companies now use remote teams to drive product, CX, sales, and marketing.
Prove VE is not a vendor, but an embedded growth enabler.

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

content.text: What Silicon Valley Got Wrong About Hiring – And What India Got Right
Challenge US/EU hiring assumptions and highlight India’s operational and technical advantage.
Layoffs, cost pressures, and AI disruption are forcing CXOs to re-evaluate.
Position VE as a leadership and execution powerhouse, not just a low-cost vendor.

content.text: it’s a nice piece of content. Informative and data-driven. I have 2-3 points to share:
Let’s keep it more informative and less promotional.
Avoid using “VE” in the copy since we’re posting this from the VE page.
Try to make it even more data and stat-driven. Adding credible sources will help build authenticity.
Let’s skip a CTA here. Instead, you can end with a suggestions or tips to follow for the reader.
, I have implemented the feedback as suggested. Please have a look and let me know -
